document_data.caption: A sack full of various gemstones spills out.
document_data.name: Gem
document_data.mainbody: A '''gem''' was a valuable stone found in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Gem Grades:
Depending on quality and value, a gem could be any of:
* [[Ornamental stones]] (base value 10 gp)
* [[Semi-precious stones]] (base value 50 gp)
* [[Fancy stones]] (base value 100 gp)
* [[Precious stones]] (base value 500 gp)
* [[Gem stones]] (base value 1000 gp)
* [[Jewels]] (base value 5000 gp)
document_data.Gem Magic:
{{Main|Gem magic}}
Many gems had special [[magic]]al uses, either stemming from their value as [[material component]]s in spellcasting and [[item enchantment]] or from their own innate and varied powers.
